plot: A pair of resident assistants are doing duty rounds in their dormitory when they stumble upon a heavily intoxicated resident. They attempt to document him, but things do not go according to plan.
title: The Documentation
plot_es: A pair of resident assistants are doing duty rounds in their dormitory when they stumble upon a heavily intoxicated resident. They attempt to document him, but things do not go according to plan.
plot_en: A pair of resident assistants are doing duty rounds in their dormitory when they stumble upon a heavily intoxicated resident. They attempt to document him, but things do not go according to plan.
